comments.author: bugs@pettay.fi
comments.text:
ImageMap has some very old code, originated from Classic.
Methods like Area::ParseCoords are very unefficient and error prone.
comments.creator: bugs@pettay.fi
comments.raw_text:
ImageMap has some very old code, originated from Classic.
Methods like Area::ParseCoords are very unefficient and error prone.

comments.creator: dholbert@mozilla.com
comments.text:
While we're at it, nsImageMap's Init() and Destroy() methods should probably be folded into the constructor/destructor.

The methods seem to exist so that they have the ability to fail, but I'm not sure they really *can* meaningfully fail, and even if they could, their callers (in nsImageFrame) don't bother checking for failure anyway.
comments.author: dholbert@mozilla.com
